pages.text: $(item)Powdercake$() is a Food item cooked in the $(pot)Crock Pot$() by combining at least 1 $(item)Corn/Popcorn$(), 1 $(item)Honeycomb$(), and 1 $(item)Stick/Bamboo$(). It takes 10 seconds to cook.$(br2)$(item)Powdercake$() can tempt $(thing)Animals$() like Cow, Chicken and other animals on land or in the sky.
